Helvete skit. Läste trådar på imdb och hittade en tråd som avslöjade en viktigt sak i filmen. 
En Spoiler. 
Att Hitler, han dör! Nä, skämt åsido, däremot en annan sak som man kanske inte ville veta, ville se eller whatever. 
Säkert en väldigt intressant film, att se Hitler, mänsklig.

I've just converted these files to VOBs (with dvd Santa) and I must say I'm really impressed !! Excellent quality .. but I must admit I burned it to 2 dvd's to keep a good audio- and videoratio but it was well worth it !!
As a Dutchman I enjoy the subs but I can imagine that these hard subs could get annoying by the none-Ducth speaking ppl. As for the timer in the upperleft of the screen: even though it is quite there it doesn't bother me at all. It is placed high enough in the screen to fully enjoy the movie.
Great upload !! Much appreciated !!

Does anyone got this movie as a DVDrip and not DVDscr. I am really grateful for this version, but i would really be happy if someone could put out a ripped version with eng. subs...thanks

Så här gör ni:
Ni laddar ner subben till filmen från www.extratitles.to.
Fixar så att den får samma namn som film-filerna.
Går in i egenskaper för vobsub, trycker på Launch config dialog. Och i Border Style väljer ni "Opaque box" så blir det en svart ram runt texten :)

This has to be the best german movie created for quite some time, I'm not surprised it was nominated for the oscars. It's also very on time.
